meanings.definition: Pacos: a type of domesticated South American camelid, similar to a llama but smaller
meanings.sent1: The pacos grazed peacefully in the field.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of pacos at the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The pacos decided to have a race for fun.
meanings.sent4: The pacos stood out in the herd with their unique markings.
meanings.sent5: The children were excited to feed and pet the pacos during their visit.

meanings.definition: Pacos: the plural form of the word 'paco', meaning a person who is addicted to drugs, especially heroin
meanings.sent1: She was worried about her brother who had become a paco.
meanings.sent2: The community outreach program aimed to help pacos recover.
meanings.sent3: The paco accidentally mistook sugar for drugs in a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: His addiction had turned him into a paco, always chasing the next high.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the struggles of a paco trying to break free from addiction.
